title: customer registration success
description: Test the customer registration endpoint with valid data to ensure a new customer account is created successfully and a 201 response is returned.

title: customer login success and failure
description: Test the customer login endpoint with valid credentials to verify successful login and token issuance, and with invalid credentials to verify a 401 unauthorized response.

title: customer logout with valid token
description: Test the customer logout endpoint with a valid authentication token to ensure the token is invalidated and a 200 response is returned confirming successful logout.

title: seller registration success
description: Test the seller registration endpoint with valid store and owner details to ensure a new seller account is created successfully and a 201 response is returned.

title: vehicles list retrieval
description: Test the public vehicles endpoint to verify it returns a complete and accurate list of vehicles with a 200 response.

title: categories list retrieval
description: Test the public categories endpoint to verify it returns a complete and accurate list of categories with a 200 response.

title: parts search by make and model
description: Test the parts search endpoint with valid vehicle make and model query parameters to ensure it returns a relevant list of parts filtered accordingly with a 200 response.
